entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING ENDED, Port Elgin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:45 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:49 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 3.
